name: Item Ledger Summary
query:
WITH
item AS (
SELECT
    item_name
FROM
    `tabItem`
WHERE
    name = %(item_code)s
),
sales_vouchers AS (
	SELECT
		'Sales Invoice' AS voucher_type,
		sales_invoice.name AS voucher_no,
		sales_invoice.customer,
		customer.customer_name
	FROM
		`tabSales Invoice` sales_invoice
	INNER JOIN
        `tabCustomer` customer
	ON
	    sales_invoice.customer = customer.name
	WHERE
		sales_invoice.docstatus = 1
	AND
		sales_invoice.update_stock = 1
	AND
		sales_invoice.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s		
	UNION ALL
	SELECT
		'Delivery Note' AS voucher_type,
		delivery_note.name AS voucher_no,
		delivery_note.customer,
		customer.customer_name
	FROM
		`tabDelivery Note` delivery_note
	INNER JOIN
        `tabCustomer` customer
	ON
	    delivery_note.customer = customer.name
	WHERE
		delivery_note.docstatus = 1
	AND
		delivery_note.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
),
opening AS (
	SELECT
		NULL AS posting_date,
		NULL AS posting_time,
		'Opening' AS voucher_type,
		NULL AS voucher_no,
		NULL AS customer_name,
		IFNULL(SUM(IF(actual_qty > 0, actual_qty, 0)), 0) AS qty_in,
		IFNULL(SUM(IF(actual_qty < 0, actual_qty, 0)), 0) * -1 AS qty_out
	FROM
		`tabStock Ledger Entry`
	WHERE
		is_cancelled = 0
	AND
		item_code = %(item_code)s
	AND
		posting_date < %(from_date)s
),
transactions AS (
	SELECT
		stock_ledger_entry.posting_date,
		stock_ledger_entry.posting_time,
		stock_ledger_entry.voucher_type,
		stock_ledger_entry.voucher_no,
		sales_vouchers.customer_name,
		IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock_ledger_entry.actual_qty > 0, stock_ledger_entry.actual_qty, 0)), 0) AS qty_in,
		IFNULL(SUM(IF(stock_ledger_entry.actual_qty < 0, stock_ledger_entry.actual_qty, 0)), 0) * -1 AS qty_out
	FROM
		`tabStock Ledger Entry` stock_ledger_entry
	LEFT JOIN
		sales_vouchers
	ON
		stock_ledger_entry.voucher_type = sales_vouchers.voucher_type AND stock_ledger_entry.voucher_no = sales_vouchers.voucher_no
	WHERE
		stock_ledger_entry.is_cancelled = 0
	AND
		stock_ledger_entry.item_code = %(item_code)s
	AND
		stock_ledger_entry.posting_date BETWEEN %(from_date)s AND %(to_date)s
	GROUP BY
		stock_ledger_entry.posting_date,
		stock_ledger_entry.voucher_type,
		stock_ledger_entry.voucher_no,
		sales_vouchers.customer_name
),
translation AS (
SELECT
    source_text,
    translated_text
FROM
    `tabTranslation`
WHERE
    language = 'ar'
GROUP BY
    source_text
)
SELECT
	stock_ledger_entry.posting_date,
	IF(translation.translated_text IS NOT NULL, translation.translated_text, stock_ledger_entry.voucher_type) AS translated_voucher_type,
	stock_ledger_entry.voucher_no,
	stock_ledger_entry.customer_name,
	stock_ledger_entry.qty_in,
	stock_ledger_entry.qty_out,
	SUM(stock_ledger_entry.qty_in) OVER (ORDER BY stock_ledger_entry.posting_date, stock_ledger_entry.voucher_no) - SUM(stock_ledger_entry.qty_out) OVER (ORDER BY stock_ledger_entry.posting_date, stock_ledger_entry.voucher_no) AS balance,
	item.item_name,
	stock_ledger_entry.voucher_type
FROM
	(
	SELECT * FROM opening
	UNION ALL
	SELECT * FROM transactions
	) stock_ledger_entry
LEFT JOIN
    item
ON
    TRUE
LEFT JOIN
    translation
ON
    stock_ledger_entry.voucher_type = translation.source_text
ORDER BY
	stock_ledger_entry.posting_date,
	stock_ledger_entry.posting_time,
	stock_ledger_entry.voucher_no
